item.title: Bergen & EPIT 2024
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: From 29. April to 17. May I travelled together with Peter ↗ Bergen for 2 weeks of work and to France EPIT 2024 ↗ for 1 week of workshop. I thank Peter for planning this trip. Bergen, Norway We were invited to Bergen to work with Sushmita Gupta ↗ and meet members of the Algorithms Group ↗. To get there we flew from Birmingham to Bergen through Copenhagen. From Bergen airport it is easy to get in-city using their Bybanen tram.
